about:
Hi! I'm a graphic designer who specializes in logo design & brand identity. I like to call myself creative, and clients usually surprisingly agree! I'm a big hater of unoriginalty and corniness and I fight them every day with my designs, but as they say, you can't fight fire with fire!
  Yep, I just roasted myself right there and I'm not sure why

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about: Baguio City, Philippines based artist Mark aka. Deo Dude is an artist specializing in logo designs, vector and raster illustrations. He's been making arts and illustrations since he can remember. Started as a freelancer in the traditional arts and lately in the animation field which was cut short. He never let go of his love for illustrations and graphic design. Now he's devoted his time and craft as a designer and illustrator.

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about:
Hi, how are you? I'm João Ramborger.
  I believe a logo is much more than just a graphic symbol, it’s the soul of a company, the first step.
  My work has a focus on creating logos because I believe it’s the best way to put into practice my design knowledge, combined with marketing and neuromarketing skills, in order to achieve the best product.
  For over 16 years I’ve been learning this field, focusing on what my clients, all over the world, envision for the area they chose to act.
tags: ['Logo design', 'Logo & brand identity pack', 'Logo & brand guide']
reviews: ['We highly recommend João Ramborger!  He is so talented and was very patient with our many tweaks and requests.  He was quick to respond and made all our requests happen beautifully and in record time!  He is very creative and put a great deal of thought...', 'One of the best designers we have worked with! Attention to detail and design concepts are premium.', 'Ramborger Design was fantastic in understanding the direction we wanted to go.  Changes, were made quickly and with multiple options.  He knew what I was looking for before I did!  Great Job, fun experience!']

Giving the BEST design is a must, winning the CONTEST is a bonus.

about:
Graphiste freelance, j’exerce depuis plus de dix ans la spécialisation du design de logo.
  Votre futur logo sera la pièce maîtresse de votre identité visuelle.
  Créé sur-mesure, il sera au reflet de votre cahier des charges et de vos attentes. Il sera sobre, premium, ou bien audacieux, dans un style capable de permettre à votre marque d’être reconnaissable en un clin d’œil.
  Simple, d’esprit flat design, figuratif ou iconique.

about:
I am a visual artist with a passion for design, illustration and video games.
  I believe that the need of each client is different, that is why I like to create designs that adapt to what each one needs.
